name: Dogme 95 Structure
description: Lars von Trier's naturalistic narrative emphasizing raw emotion and authentic human behavior
distribution_philosophy: Based on Dogme 95 principles emphasizing naturalistic development and emotional authenticity

naturalistic_setup.name: Naturalistic Setup
naturalistic_setup.description: Characters and situation established through natural, everyday interactions

emotional_catalyst.name: Emotional Catalyst
emotional_catalyst.description: A realistic event triggers emotional responses and character development

raw_exploration.name: Raw Exploration
raw_exploration.description: Extended exploration of authentic human emotions and relationships

crisis_point.name: Crisis Point
crisis_point.description: Emotional tensions reach a breaking point

naturalistic_resolution.name: Naturalistic Resolution
naturalistic_resolution.description: Resolution emerges naturally from character choices and consequences
